claim: Until Dawn was written by Sony Computer Entertainment.

claim: Until Dawn was written by Sony Computer Entertainment.

claim: Until Dawn was written by Sony Computer Entertainment.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The company was founded and established on November 16 , 1993 , as Sony Computer Entertainment , to handle Sony 's venture into video game development .

claim: Until Dawn was written by Sony Computer Entertainment.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Founded in 1984 by Jonathan Ellis , Ian Hetherington and David Lawson , the company later became a wholly owned subsidiary of Sony Computer Entertainment , and at the time of its closure employed roughly 100 individuals comprising two development teams .
